component.name: Flathub Discourse
component.summary: A forum for Flathub users

description.p: Flathub aims to be the place to get and distribute apps for Linux. It is powered by Flatpak which allows Flathub apps to run on almost any Linux distribution.

component.name: Archive.org
component.summary: Providing Universal Access to All Knowledge

description.p: Internet Archive is a non-profit digital library offering free universal access to books, movies & music, as well as 624 billion archived web pages.

component.name: iLovePDF
component.summary: Online PDF tools for PDF lovers

description.p: iLovePDF is an online service to work with PDF files completely free and easy to use. Merge PDF, split PDF, compress PDF, office to PDF, PDF to JPG and more!

component.name: Facebook
component.summary: Connect with people you know!

description.p: Log into Facebook to start sharing and connecting with your friends, family, and people you know.

component.name: Instructables
component.summary: A community for people who like to make things

description.p: Instructables is a community for people who like to make things. Come explore, share, and make your next project with us!

component.name: Goodreads
component.summary: Discover and share books you love on Goodreads, the world's largest site for readers and book recommendations!

description.p: Find and read more books you’ll love, and keep track of the books you want to read. Be part of the world’s largest community of book lovers on Goodreads.

component.name: Merriam-Webster Dictionary
component.summary: America's most-trusted online dictionary

description.p: The dictionary by Merriam-Webster is America's most trusted online dictionary for English word definitions, meanings, and pronunciation. \#wordsmatter

component.name: AP NEWS
component.summary: Breaking News & Latest News Today

description.p: Stay informed and read the latest news today from The Associated Press, the definitive source for independent journalism from every corner of the globe.

component.name: Snapdrop
component.summary: Local network file sharing in your browser

description.p: Instantly share images, videos, PDFs, and links with people nearby. Peer2Peer and Open Source. No Setup, No Signup.

component.name: Quora
component.summary: A place to gain and share knowledge

description.p: Quora is a place to gain and share knowledge. It's a platform to ask questions and connect with people who contribute unique insights and quality answers. This empowers people to learn from each other and to better understand the world.

component.name: iCloud
component.summary: Access your photos, videos, documents, notes, contacts, and more

description.p: iCloud is essential for keeping personal information from your devices safe, up to date, and available wherever you are.

component.name: diagrams.net
component.summary: draw.io is free online diagram software for making flowcharts, process diagrams, org charts, UML, ER and network diagrams

description.p: draw.io is a free online diagramming application and flowchart maker. You can use it to create UML, entity relationship, org charts, BPMN and BPM, database schema and networks. Also possible are telecommunication network, workflow, flowcharts, maps overlays and GIS, electronic circuit and social network diagrams.

component.name: PayPal
component.summary: Digital Wallets, Money Management, and More

description.p: PayPal is the faster, safer way to send and receive money or make an online payment. Get started or create a merchant account to accept payments.

component.name: edX
component.summary: Free Online Courses by Harvard, MIT, & more

description.p: Access 2000 free online courses from 140 leading institutions worldwide. Gain new skills and earn a certificate of completion.

component.name: Endless Community
component.summary: A forum to discuss, get help with, and give feedback on Endless OS

description.p: The Endless Community forum is a place to share tips about using Endless OS, ask for advice or support when something doesn't work quite right, get announcements about upcoming releases, and give your feedback. Join the conversation with fellow community members and Endless OS Foundation staff.

component.name: Reddit
component.summary: A network of communities for people and their interests!

description.p: Reddit is a network of communities where people can dive into their interests, hobbies and passions. There's a community for whatever you're interested in on Reddit.

component.name: Twitter
component.summary: The latest stories on Twitter - as told by Tweets

description.p: Twitter is what’s happening and what people are talking about right now.

component.name: Scribd
component.summary: Discover the Best eBooks, Audiobooks, Magazines, Sheet Music, and More
Descubra los mejores libros electrónicos, audiolibros, revistas, partituras y más
Découvrez les meilleurs livres électroniques, livres audio, magazines, partitions et bien plus encore
Descubra os melhores livros digitais, audiobooks, revistas, partituras e muito mais

description.p: Scribd gives you access to millions of ebooks, audiobooks, magazines, podcasts, and more — all in one place, for one price.

component.name: Pinterest
component.summary: Discover recipes, home ideas, style inspiration and other ideas to try
Descubre recetas, inspiración para tu hogar, recomendaciones de estilo y otras ideas que probar
Trouvez des inspirations et idées pratiques pour tous vos projets au quotidien sur Pinterest
Descubra receitas, dicas para a casa, inspirações para o seu estilo e outras ideias para experimentar

description.p: Pinterest is a visual discovery engine for finding ideas like recipes, home and style inspiration, and more.

component.name: MIT OpenCourseWare
component.summary: Free Online Course Materials

description.p: MIT OpenCourseWare is a web based publication of virtually all MIT course content. OCW is open and available to the world and is a permanent MIT activity

component.name: Mayo Clinic
component.summary: Seamless care that revolves around you

description.p: More than 4,700 physicians and scientists collaborate across Mayo Clinic campuses in Arizona, Florida and Minnesota. U.S. News & World Report ranks Mayo Clinic as the \#1 hospital overall and \#1 in more specialties than any other hospital in the nation.

component.developer_name: Mayo Foundation for Medical Education and Research

component.name: Twitch
component.summary: Livestreaming service for practically everything!

description.p: Twitch is an interactive livestreaming service for content spanning gaming, entertainment, sports, music, and more. There's something for everyone on Twitch.
Twitch es un servicio de transmisión en directo e interactivo para contenido sobre juegos, ocio, deportes, música y mucho más. En Twitch hay sitio para todo el mundo.
Twitch est un service de streaming interactif de jeux vidéo, de divertissement, de musique, de sport, etc. Il y en a pour tous les goûts sur Twitch.
A Twitch é um serviço de transmissão ao vivo interativo para conteúdo que abrange jogos, entretenimento, esportes, música e muito mais. Há algo para todo mundo na Twitch.

component.name: Healthline
component.summary: Medical information and health advice you can trust

description.p: We're committed to being your source for expert health guidance. Come to us in your pursuit of wellness.

component.name: DevDocs
component.summary: DevDocs combines multiple API documentations in a fast, organized, and searchable interface

description.p: Fast, offline, and free documentation browser for developers. Search 100+ docs in one web app including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Ruby, Python, Go, C, C++, and many more.

component.name: BBC
component.summary: Breaking news, sport, TV, radio and a whole lot more

description.p: The BBC informs, educates and entertains - wherever you are, whatever your age.

component.name: Google Arts & Culture
component.summary: Bringing the world's treasures online!

description.p: Google Arts & Culture features content from over 2000 leading museums and archives who have partnered with the Google Cultural Institute to bring the world's treasures online.

component.name: Investopedia
component.summary: The world's leading source of financial content on the web!

description.p: Investopedia is the world's leading source of financial content on the web, ranging from market news to retirement strategies, investing education to insights from advisors.

component.name: Todoist
component.summary: A to-do list to organize your work and life
Una "to do list" para organizar tu trabajo y tu vida
Une to do list pour organiser vie et travail
A lista de tarefas para organizar o trabalho e a vida

description.p: Trusted by 30 million people and teams. Todoist is the world's favorite task manager and to-do list app. Finally become focused, organized and calm.
Con la confianza de 30 millones de personas y equipos, Todoist es la administradora de tareas y app de listas de pendientes favorita del mundo. Concéntrate, organízate y conserva la calma... por fin.
30 millions de personnes et d'équipes lui font confiance. Todoist est l'application de gestion de tâches et de to do list préférée des utilisateurs. Gagnez en concentration, organisation et sérénité.

Mais de 30 milhões de pessoas e equipes confiam no Todoist. O Todoist é o gerenciador e aplicativo de lista de tarefas favorito do mundo. Finalmente alcance o foco, a organização e a calma tão desejados.

component.name: Google Messages
component.summary: Messages for web

description.p: Use Messages for web to send SMS, MMS, and RCS messages from your computer. Open the Messages app on your Android phone to get started.

component.name: Common Sense Media
component.summary: Age-Based Media Reviews for Families

description.p: Common Sense Media is the leading source of entertainment and technology recommendations for families. Parents trust our expert reviews and objective advice.

component.name: Common Sense Education
component.summary: Free Digital Citizenship curriculum, reviews of EdTech apps, and resources for student privacy

description.p: Common Sense Education provides educators and students with the resources they need to harness the power of technology for learning and life. Find a free K-12 Digital Citizenship curriculum, reviews of popular EdTech apps, and resources for protecting student privacy.

component.name: LinkedIn
component.summary: Connecting the world’s professionals to make them more productive and successful

description.p: Manage your professional identity. Build and engage with your professional network. Access knowledge, insights and opportunities.
Gestiona tu identidad profesional. Amplía e interactúa con tu red profesional. Accede a conocimientos, información y oportunidades.
Gérez votre image professionnelle. Constituez votre réseau professionnel et communiquez avec celui-ci. Gagnez des connaissances, accédez à des idées et des opportunités.
Gerencie sua identidade profissional. Crie sua rede profissional e interaja com ela. Acesse estatísticas, conhecimento e oportunidades.

component.name: The Weather Channel
component.summary: National and Local Weather Radar, Daily Forecast, Hurricane and information from The Weather Channel and weather.com
Radar del tiempo nacional y local, pronóstico diario, huracanes e información de The Weather Channel y weather.com

description.p: The Weather Channel and weather.com provide a national and local weather forecast for cities, as well as weather radar, report and hurricane coverage
The Weather Channel y weather.com proporcionan el pronóstico nacional y local para las ciudades, el radar del tiempo, reportes y cobertura de huracanes.

component.name: GNOME Discourse
component.summary: A forum for GNOME users

description.p: GNOME Project and Community related discussions.

component.name: Squoosh
component.summary: An image compression web app that reduces image sizes through numerous formats

description.p: Squoosh is the ultimate image optimizer that allows you to compress and compare images with different codecs in your browser.

component.name: Strudel
component.summary: Music live coding environment

description.p: Strudel is a music live coding environment for the browser, porting the TidalCycles pattern language to JavaScript.

component.name: Pinafore for Mastodon
component.summary: An alternative web client for Mastodon

description.p: Pinafore is an alternative web client for Mastodon that focuses on speed, simplicity, Multi-account Support, Offline Usability, Mobile Support, and User Privacy.

component.name: Instagram
component.summary: Give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together

description.p: A simple, fun & creative way to capture, edit & share photos, videos & messages with friends & family.

component.name: StackEdit
component.summary: Free, open-source, full-featured Markdown editor

description.p: Full-featured, open-source Markdown editor based on PageDown, the Markdown library used by Stack Overflow and the other Stack Exchange sites.

component.name: Excalidraw
component.summary: Collaborative whiteboarding made easy

description.p: Excalidraw is a virtual collaborative whiteboard tool that lets you easily sketch diagrams that have a hand-drawn feel to them.

component.name: YouTube
component.summary: Enjoy the videos and music you love and share your own!

description.p: Enjoy the videos and music you love, upload original content, and share it all with friends, family, and the world on YouTube.
